content.rendered:
Heavenly Hundred Commemoration – Charity Concert by “Gerdan”

This year marks the Second Anniversary of the mass shootings on Maidan during the Revolution of Dignity, Ukraine’s fight for Freedom. The Embassy of Ukraine in the USA, Gerdan and United Help Ukraine invite you to a charity concert to commemorate the Heavenly Hundred who gave their lives for free Ukraine. Please come and support Ukraine.

The event included amazing music by “Gerdan,” silent auctions and a reception to follow. Gerdan musicians: Solomia Gorokhivska (violin), Oksana Skidan (piano), and Andrei Pidkivka (flute). More information at www.Gerdan.info.

News coverage of the event:

Voice of America in Russian (starting 50 seconds after beginning): http://ukrainian.voanews.com/…/studio-washing…/3201974.html…

Voice of America in Ukrainian: https://www.facebook.com/ukr.embassy.usa/videos/1036839213025977/

Ukraina Channel: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=keTnU_Ihml8&feature=youtu.be

Ukrinform article: http://www.ukrinform.ua/…/1969049-u-vasingtoni-vsanuvali-pa…

Please also watch a recent Voice of America TV program about: https://www.facebook.com/chastime/videos/1125069290861120/?pnref=story

Pictures from the event: https://www.facebook.com/media/set/…
